name: Odd-Eyes Meteorburst Dragon
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; Special Summon it, also this card cannot attack for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Odd-Eyes Meteorburst Dragon" once per turn. Your opponent cannot activate monster effects during the Battle Phase.
